page.title: 08WATERMOOR SCHOOL
page.content: Watermoor school is a small town school with 192 pupils.The buildings are old with no hall but are due to be extended next year. There are 4 junior and 3 infant classes,8 teachers a headmaster ,a secretary,2 cleaners, cooks and a lollipop lady. The children start at 9 am.They have an hour for lunch and two 15 minute playtimes.Infants go home at 3 pm, juniors at 3.30.{Out of school {activities}include various sports, choir,recorders,guitars,cycling, rollerskating,visits to local places and residential trips. {Here is a list of activities covered {by 5-6 yr old infants:}Writing,maths reading,computer games,puzzles,jigsaws sand,water,painting,home corner,music and movement,P.E.,school trips,lego, building bricks,plasticine,songs,poems nursery rhymes,news,simple games
